modalities.speech: To design rock and roll jewelry, start by gathering a bronze tone fish hook ear wire, a pre-studded and pre-wired component, and an oval shaped jump ring with a pre-cut hole. Then, use pliers to attach the component to the jump ring, add a fish hook ear wire, and carefully close the jump ring to complete the studded rock and roll earring.
